Text.Page:
The argons are gone, but they left a few things behind. Such as nagasâ€”namely {@Creature:47#4001#argonomorph dagonite crusaders}. Having fewer of them would make our restoration smoother.

And look for faeries. We haven't seen any recently.
Well, if there are faeries out there, they'll be safer with fewer nagas roaming around. Thank you.
